attributes.action: Abolish fines for school non attendance while covid still threatens lives.
attributes.additional_details:
Parents are responsible for their children' s health and safety and it their right to protect and maintain them under the law. This is not parliament's right.
If a child dies because of contracting it or passing it to older parents, the government and ministers who impose the threat of fines ought to be liable.
attributes.background: Remove the threat of fines to parents for school non attendance, while COVID is a threat to children's livres and while they may transmit it to their parents.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300399
